description.en: Here you will learn some English words related to the different types of bachelor's degrees such as "BLitt", "BPharm", and "BMS".
description.id: Di sini Anda akan belajar beberapa kata bahasa Inggris yang terkait dengan berbagai jenis gelar sarjana seperti "blitt", "bpharm", dan "bms".

en.long: a university degree awarded to someone who has passed a certain number of credits in the arts, humanities, or some other disciplines

id.long: Gelar sarjana yang diberikan kepada seseorang yang telah mengeluarkan sejumlah kredit dalam seni, humaniora, atau disiplin ilmu lainnya

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on accounting principles and practices

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada prinsip dan praktik akuntansi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of architecture and design

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi arsitektur dan desain

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of business management and administration

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi manajemen bisnis dan administrasi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of commerce, economics, and business-related subjects

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi perdagangan, ekonomi, dan mata pelajaran terkait bisnis

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of computer science, including programming, algorithms, and software development

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi ilmu komputer, termasuk pemrograman, algoritma, dan pengembangan perangkat lunak

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential that focuses on the study of computer science and its practical applications, including programming languages, software development, and database management

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi ilmu komputer dan aplikasi praktisnya, termasuk bahasa pemrograman, pengembangan perangkat lunak, dan manajemen basis data

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of civil law principles and legal systems

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi prinsip -prinsip hukum sipil dan sistem hukum

en.long: an academic degree awarded to students who have completed a course of study in theology or religious studies

id.long: gelar akademik yang diberikan kepada siswa yang telah menyelesaikan kursus studi dalam teologi atau studi agama

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of economic principles, theories, and policies

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi prinsip, teori, dan kebijakan ekonomi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of educational theory, teaching methods, and classroom management

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi teori pendidikan, metode pengajaran, dan manajemen kelas

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of engineering principles, design, and problem-solving

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi prinsip-prinsip teknik, desain, dan pemecahan masalah

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of visual or performing arts, including disciplines such as painting, sculpture, dance, theater, and music

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi seni visual atau pertunjukan, termasuk disiplin ilmu seperti lukisan, patung, tari, teater, dan musik

en.long: an undergraduate academic degree in law, typically earned after completing a program of study that covers various aspects of legal theory, practice, and jurisprudence

id.long: Gelar akademik sarjana dalam bidang hukum, biasanya diperoleh setelah menyelesaikan program studi yang mencakup berbagai aspek teori hukum, praktik, dan yurisprudensi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of literature, languages, and literary theory

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi sastra, bahasa, dan teori sastra

en.long: an undergraduate degree program that focuses on the study of music theory, performance, composition, and music history

id.long: Program gelar sarjana yang berfokus pada studi teori musik, kinerja, komposisi, dan sejarah musik

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of management principles, business administration, and organizational leadership

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi prinsip -prinsip manajemen, administrasi bisnis, dan kepemimpinan organisasi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of pharmaceutical sciences, drug discovery, pharmacology, and pharmacy practice

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi ilmu farmasi, penemuan obat, farmakologi, dan praktik farmasi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of philosophy, including ethics, metaphysics, logic, and epistemology

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi filsafat, termasuk etika, metafisika, logika, dan epistemologi

en.long: a university degree that a student receives in particular subjects, generally after three to five years of study

id.long: gelar sarjana yang diterima seorang siswa dalam mata pelajaran tertentu, umumnya setelah tiga hingga lima tahun belajar

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of nursing theory, clinical practice, healthcare leadership, and patient care

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi teori keperawatan, praktik klinis, kepemimpinan kesehatan, dan perawatan pasien

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of social work theory, methods, and practice, with an emphasis on promoting social justice and enhancing the well-being of individuals and communities

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana berfokus pada studi teori, metode, dan praktik pekerjaan sosial, dengan penekanan pada mempromosikan keadilan sosial dan meningkatkan kesejahteraan individu dan komunitas

cards.pinyin: shèhuì gōng zuò xuéshì xué wèi

en.long: an undergraduate academic credential focused on the study of technology, engineering principles, and applied sciences

id.long: Kredensial akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi teknologi, prinsip -prinsip teknik, dan ilmu terapan

en.long: an undergraduate academic degree focusing on the study of religious beliefs, doctrines, and practices

id.long: Gelar akademik sarjana yang berfokus pada studi keyakinan agama, doktrin, dan praktik

en.short: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery
en.long: an undergraduate medical degree awarded upon completion of medical school

id.long: Gelar kedokteran sarjana yang diberikan setelah menyelesaikan sekolah kedokteran

cards.simplified: 医学学士学位和外科学士学位
cards.traditional: 醫學學士學位和外科學士學位
cards.pinyin: yīxué xuéshì xué wèi hé wàikē xué Shì xuéwèi
